allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement Core library with network scanning and device management

Add models:
- Device, DeviceList for persistent device storage
- NetworkInterfaceInfo for interface detection
- ScanResult, DiscoveredDevice for scan operations
- AppSettings for configuration

Add services:
- NetworkInterfaceService: Detects interfaces, prioritizes Ethernet
- SubnetCalculator: CIDR parsing, host enumeration
- NetworkScanner: Async ping sweep with concurrency control
- JsonDeviceRepository: Device persistence to %APPDATA%
- JsonSettingsService: Settings persistence
- DeviceManager: High-level orchestration with auto-removal

Add comprehensive unit tests \(115 tests passing\):
- SubnetCalculator, repository, settings, interface, device manager tests
- Model tests for Device, AppSettings, ScanResult

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
